mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (point, isNotice, color, content, likeCount, dislikeCount, commentCount, shareCount, providerUserId, name, ipAddress, tags, regDate) VALUES (#{point}, #{isNotice}, #{color}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{dislikeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{shareCount}, #{providerUserId}, #{name}, #{ipAddress}, #{tags}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET point = #{point}, isNotice = #{isNotice}, color = #{color}, content = #{content}, likeCount = #{likeCount}, dislikeCount = #{dislikeCount}, commentCount = #{commentCount}, shareCount = #{shareCount}, providerUserId = #{providerUserId}, name = #{name}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress}, tags = #{tags} where documentId = #{documentId};
